name: Dream Wedding - wedding spa salon and makeup
name_original: Dream Wedding - wedding spa salon and makeup
description:
Come out your imagination and enter the real world to plan your dream wedding.
Yes the day has arrived! Your wedding day. Sounds like dream comes true.
So many wedding preparations are yet to finish. My wedding outfits, groom clothes,
matching accessories etc.
Make sure bride should have royal make up.
Dream wedding is bunch of celebration from spa treatment to wedding dresses,
wedding party with friends and elegant eve to enhance her love and romance.
Bride’s face should shine like star girl and pick most attractive wedding hairstyle!
Apply rollers to curl her hairs and try every new bride hairstyles to make dream wedding day complete.

Features:

=> Dream wedding with special facial packs, cream, thinner etc
=> Real makeup shades with beautiful colors and glitter.
=> Fantasy your fashion style with eyeliner, eyelashes, blushes etc
=> Finally choose me a glamorous dream wedding outfit to make my day.
=> Matching earings, necklace, wedding bouquets, wedding net veil etc
